ARABIC: هَٰذَا خَلْقُ ٱللَّهِ فَأَرُونِى مَاذَا خَلَقَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦ بَلِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ فِى ضَلَٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is Allah's creation. Show me then what those besides Him have created! The wrongdoers are clearly
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Such is God's creation. Show me now what those (they worship) beside Him have created. Surely the evil-doers are in clear error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Such is Allah's creation. Show me, then, what any others, apart from Allah, have created. Nay, the fact is that the wrong-doers are in manifest error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is the creation of God. Show me what those whom you consider equal to God have created. In fact, the unjust ones are in plain error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Allah has created this – therefore show me what has been created by those other than Him; in fact the unjust are in open error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is the creation of Allah. So, show Me that which those besides Him have created. Nay, the wrongdoers are in plain error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is Allah's creation, but show Me what those besides Him have created. Nay, the unjust are in manifest error
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is God's creation; now show me what those have created that are apart from Him! Nay, but the evildoers are in manifest error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is the Creation of Allah. Now show me that which those (ye worship) beside Him have created. Nay, but the wrong-doers are in error manifest!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: this is God's creation. Show me then what those besides Him have created! The wrongdoers are in manifest error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: This is the creation of Allah; shew that which those beside Him me have created. Aye! the wrong-doers are in error manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is the creation of Allah. Now show Me what others besides Him have created. Indeed, the wrongdoers are in manifest error!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Such is the Creation of Allah: now show Me what is there that others besides Him have created: nay, but the Transgressors are in manifest error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This is the creation of Allah. So show Me that which those (whom you worship), besides Him have created. Nay, the Zalimun (polytheists, wrong-doers and those who do not believe in the Oneness of Allah) are in plain error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Such is the creation of Allah; now show me what, other than Him, created! No, the harmdoers are in clear error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Such is God’s creation. Now show me what those besides Him have created. In fact, the wicked are in obvious error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This is the creation of Allah. So show Me what those other than Him have created. Rather, the wrongdoers are in clear error.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [31:11] This is God’s creation, in other words, what is created by Him. Now show me, inform me, O people of Mecca, what those [you worship] besides Him, [those] other than Him, have created, namely, your gods, so that you have associated them with Him, exalted be He (mā is an interrogative of denial and a subject; dhā has the significance of alladhī, and what follows it of the relative clause is the predicate [of the subject mā]; arūnī glosses ‘the action’, and what follows it stands in place of two direct objects). Nay (bal, is for transition) but the evildoers are in manifest error, [error] that is evident because of their ascribing partners to God: and you are like them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (This is the Creation of Allah) this is the creation which I have created. (Now show me that which those (ye worship) beside Him) i.e. the idols (have created. Nay, but the wrong-doers) the idolaters (are in error manifest) in manifest error!
